title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; same features as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider in LangChain apps.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem: idiomatic Ollama client with chat, embed, and model management methods.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with prompt history, syntax highlighting, and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant.

title: ollama-hub
summary: Community-curated registry of Modelfiles, prompts, and LoRA adapters for Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with your docs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings any Ollama model into your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that caches and serves Ollama models inside CI pipelines for reproducible LLM tests.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama with async/await, JSON marshalling, and nimble package.

title: ollama-cpp
summary: Header-only C++17 wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with Boost.Asio example.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library that wraps Ollama for real-time Phoenix LiveView chat apps.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision GPU-enabled AWS EC2 instances with Ollama pre-installed.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official async Rust crate for Ollama using reqwest and tokio.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama with std.http and comptime JSON parsing.
